headline: Activist Investor Demands CSX Explore a Merger or Oust CEO
summary: Ancora called on CSX to engage with both BNSF and CPKC, as "no railroad has more to lose" if the Union Pacific-Norfolk Southern merger gets approved.

raw.headline: Activist Investor Demands CSX Explore a Merger or Oust CEO
raw.summary: Ancora called on CSX to engage with both BNSF and CPKC, as "no railroad has more to lose" if the Union Pacific-Norfolk Southern merger gets approved.

headline: Activist Letter to CSX Is ‘Unnecessarily Aggressive,’ Says Analyst. Ancora Disagrees.
summary: Activist investor Ancora has an idea that everyone else seems to share. It wants CSX to pursue a merger.

headline: Will CSX Explore Merger Options Post Pressure From Activist Investor?
summary: CSX faces investor pressure as Ancora Holdings urges the board to explore merger options amid weak performance and rising competition in the rail industry.

headline: The Tech Stocks Selloff Spells Trouble for the AI Trade. Why Markets Are Twitchy.
summary: Software stocks get hammered, railroad CSX faces mounting pressure, Fed’s July meeting minutes are coming, and more news to start your day.
